You can remove kindDefs that you see are redundant.
...the chances for these races appearing will multiply if their kinds generate anywhere other than their faction.
UNLESS that pawn has a faction that uses those pawnkinds or those pawnkinds make sense for another mechanical purpose (e.g. androids or children).
HOWEVER, do NOT make the same mistake as I did below. Removing the colonist defs of the races will delete any colonists that were previously that pawnKind. This applies to faction leaders and world pawns too. Do NOT remove pawnKindDefs and load a previous save unless you are absolutely SURE about what you're doing! TLDR: your previous saves will become incompatible if you delete certain race pawnKinds.
Removing certain pawnKinds will also cause red error issues with certain scenarios that set specific races with a faction! <-->
